Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Used to store information that is relevant to Users.
Author:
Naveenan Yogeswaran, Savan Patel
